module.short: loads quotes (aka fortune coookies) from a file and provides actions to add a random quote as response header (X-fortune) or display it as a page.

setup.name: fortune.load
setup.short: loads cookies from a file, can be called multiple times to load data from multiple files

parameter.name: filename
parameter.short: the file to load the cookies from

action.name: fortune.header
action.short: adds a random quote as response header "X-fortune".

action.name: fortune.page
action.short: shows a random cookie as response text
